actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 11, title 38, United States Code, to increase the statutory rates for certain anatomical loss or loss of use.

summary.text: Increases the statutory disability rates to veterans for anatomical loss or loss of use of various organs and/or limbs. States that in no case shall such compensation exceed $862 per month. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 314)

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 11, title 38, United States Code, to increase the statutory rates for certain anatomical loss or loss of use.
